title: Pair of Earrings
description: pair of earrings; each main body is a circle of tightly-coiled wire wrapped around itself into a circle; five spheres run around the edge, one sphere is in the very center; three chains with wire flowers and spheres on the bottom dangle down; decorations are on both sides; ear piece is sharp wire piece curved
creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
